title: Workshop on Re-Establishing Theoretical Foundations for Learning Technology Research

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental science concepts and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment emphasizing an integrated approach to theory and practice using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze and redefine theoretical frameworks in learning technology research.
Through educational design research, learning designs that empirically validate theories can be developed.
Formative assessment tools can be utilized to measure the applicability of learning technology theories and propose improvements.

resources: Research literature on science learning skills

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
